paper.title: Chinese A Share Stock Ranking with Machine Learning Apporach
paper.abstract: How to choose stocks to make a profitable portfolio is a core question in the financial industry for stock trading. In this paper, different machine learning models are explored and compared in choosing stocks that have the highest rising probability to outperform the median return rate in Chinese A Share stock market. Random Forest achieves best performance both in predictive accuracy and annual return.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心研究内容是使用机器学习模型（如随机森林）来选择具有高上涨概率的股票，以构建能够超越市场中位数收益率的投资组合。这直接涉及投资组合管理的核心问题，即如何选择和配置资产以实现最佳收益。
